name: OrangeGrey jailbreak RES
description: This theme is great for those that want a more updated subreddit theme while still keeping to the original design.
additional_info: Please note that you should have Reddit Enhancement Suite installed to view this theme properly. v 0.32: Fixed after reddit changed some header things v 0.31: Reddit changed the header spacing v 0.3: Fixed header image when reddit inserts their own v 0.2: Updated Regex to allow for http and https Moved submission text back down to original placement Fixed hover for submission page submit button v 0.1: Initial Release
